description: Try our easy to follow Quick One-pot Ratatouille recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ratatouille,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Quick One-pot Ratatouille Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red capsicum, cored, deseeded and cut into bite-sized pieces
1 yellow capsicum, cored, deseeded and cut into bite-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan until very hot, add the onions, eggplants, courgettes, peppers and garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for a few minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, season to taste with salt and pepper and stir well.
Reduce the heat, cover the pan tightly and simmer for 15 minutes until all the vegetables are cooked. Remove from the heat and stir in the chopped parsley or basil before serving.
